entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.InvalidOperationException: InvalidOperation_ConcurrentOperationsNotSupported #28648
  • Re-use Cached Typeface for FontExtensions.ToTypeface() #28642
    Backlog
  • Re-enabled Android UITests #28640
    Backlog
  • "The given key 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.SetterSpecificity' was not present in the dictionary" during Dynamic Style Assignment in MAUI ContentView #28635
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] SearchHandler Placeholder did not update when changed at runtime #28634
    Backlog
  • Clipping elements in MAUI leads to a degradation in scrolling performance. #28629
    Backlog
  • [SPEC] Allow global ResourceDictionary configuration in MauiProgram to resolve DI and StaticResource lifecycle issues #28628
    .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [Android] CollectionView Header and Footer Do Not Align with Horizontal ItemsLayout When EmptyView is Displayed #28622
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Windows] The ClearPlaceholderIcon is not displayed in the SearchHandler #28619
    Backlog
  • [Enhancement] Fullscreen property on WebAuthenticator #28618
    Backlog

Closed

  • SwipeItemView Image not showing on first Swipe from within VerticalStackLayout - BindableLayout.ItemTemplate #25235
    Backlog
  • SwipeItemView won't render FontImageSource on first opening #18806
    Backlog
  • Move Android UITests to run on Linux #28226
    .NET 9 SR7
  • [Windows] Constructor code not executed when setting control properties globally #28637
  • [Android] App crashes after adding a custom control #19953
    Backlog
  • SearchBar focus/unfocus do not fire on Windows #28419
    .NET 9 SR7
  • RadioButton formatted string with binding does not work correctly #28621
  • .Net Maui Blazor Hybrid has an issue with iOS Screen when you double click a button #22555
    Backlog
  • Try to navigation to any XML Page after click on button that's included into IFrame Control #24353
    Triaged
  • RecyclerView Handler doesn't work in release mode #28620
  • Slim Bindings "Module not found" errors #28616
  • Update WindowsAppSDK to 1.7 #28613
  • MAUI with "dotnet watch" hot reloading does not work for CSS changes #28134
  • Android native dialog accessibility #24749
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Notification Service Extension Not Working in TestFlight Release Build #24737
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Provisioning: Only install specific Android API levels if requested #28650
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [NET10] Add global resources and configuration method #28649
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Fixed test case failure 28485 #28644
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [iOS] - Resolved Proper Rendering of Dynamic Header/Footer Updates in CV2 #28641
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Refresh Color not applying to RefreshView initially. #28638
    community ✨, area-controls-refreshview, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fix for SearchHandler Placeholder did not update when changed at runtime #28636
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix up net10 TODOs in PropertyMapper #28630
    t/breaking 💥, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-architecture, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [Testing] - Fix for flaky UI tests ShouldIgnoreBottomContentInsetForCollectionViewItems and VerifyCarouselViewBindingAndRendering #28626
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Test] Run Windows Device and UI Tests on 1ES pools #28625
    area-testing
  • [Catalyst] Fixed the CanMixGroups Set to False Still Allows Reordering Between Groups in CollectionView #28623
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for Grouping collection view without data template results in displaying the default string representation of the object #28617
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • [net10.0] Merge main to net10 #28647
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • SwipeItemView won't render FontImageSource on first opening - fix #25397
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-swipeview, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Testing] Move Android UITests to run on Linux #28513
    area-testing
  • Investigating things for easier Aspire integration #24365
    t/breaking 💥, area-core-hosting, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • TextTransformUtilites -> TextTransformUtilities #28632
    t/breaking 💥, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-architecture, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [ci] Sign fonts with 3PartyScriptsSHA2 #28646
  • Fix Tizen method parameter name misspelling #28627
    t/breaking 💥, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-fonts, platform/tizen, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [.NET 10] Make DataFlowDirection enum public #28631
    t/breaking 💥, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [ci] Fixes for net10.0 arcade push #28639
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 2 #28058
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Housekeeping] Controls sample navigation crash - fix #28069
    area-navigation, t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fixed the issue with SearchBar focus and unfocus events. #28529
    community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 3 #28103
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Allow full screen videos from WebView #15472
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-webview, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [net10.0] Update net10.0 preview3 sdk/iOS/Android/runtime/aspnet #28609
    area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [net10.0] Merge main to net10 #28611
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview3

Updated

  • [iOS] Inherit AccessibilityTraits for views wrapped inside a WrapperView #27088
    platform/iOS 🍎, do-not-merge, community ✨, area-controls-general, t/a11y, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fire Navigation Events on Root Window Page #23420
    area-navigation
  • Update CommunityToolkit.Maui & Mvvm reference in template #28510
    p/0, area-templates, .NET 9 SR6
  • [iOS] Trigger OnNavigatedTo method when hide the nav bar and using swipe gesture #27186
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR7
  • Shell - Propagate BackButtonBehaviorProperty #28615
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [net10.0, Testing] Enabled failed UITests for Switch control due to new OffColor API. #28495
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed the EmptyView and EmptyViewTemplate issues in CollectionView #28472
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for Scrollview.ScrollTo execution only returns after manual scroll #28528
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 8 #28496
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [2025/03/24] Staging - In Flight Branch #28486
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [iOS] - Fix Custom FlyoutIcon from Being Overridden to Default Color in Shell #27580
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • [iOS] CarouselView with CarouselViewHandler2 make app crash when Loop="False" and user scroll to the last position - fix #26868
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2
  • [2025/03/24] Candidate - In Flight Branch #28560
    p/0, area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR6
  • [iOS]Fix Page BackgroundImageSource scaling #27829
    area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Android][NET 10] Fix: Ensure Image consumes touches properly #28429
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨, area-gestures
  • [.Net10] [Proposal] [iOS] Shell.AutoResizeTabBarIcons #28128
    t/enhancement ☀️, proposal/open, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [Windows] Cleanup of `AccessibilityExtensions` #27052
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-general, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR7
  • Fixed the Label text is cropped inside the border control with a specific padding value on certain Android devices #28259
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, area-controls-border, partner/syncfusion
  • [net10.0] Enable back GetDrawableAsync #28483
    platform/android 🤖, area-testing, testing-flakiness, testing-reenable, testing-green-ci, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [tests] Enable back some MemoryLeak tests #28484
    platform/android 🤖, area-testing, memory-leak 💦, testing-reenable, .NET 10.0-preview4

    t/enhancement ☀️, proposal/open, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-tabbedpage, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Implement iOS secondary ToolbarItems #28185
    t/breaking 💥, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Replace MessagingCenter in AlertManager #27888
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-dialogalert, area-controls-dialog, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Nullable DatePicker (make Date, MinimumDate & MaximumDate nullable) #27921
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-datetimepicker, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Nullable TimePicker (make Time nullable) #27930
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-datetimepicker, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [Windows] Add SingleSelectionFollowsFocus Platform Specific property #28352
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, t/a11y
  • [NET10] Enable Nullability on ShellPageRendererTracker #28441
    area-controls-shell
  • [Android] Fixed GraphicsView drawable is visible outside the canvas #28353
    platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] CollectionView footer sizing when source is empty - fix #28610
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6

    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS/Mac] Fixed the Border Rendering issues in CollectionViewHandler2 #27801
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, partner/syncfusion
  • Update the comment for the test properties #27306
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR7
  • [iOS] Fixed an issue where an Editor with a small height inside a ScrollView would cause the entire page to scroll #27948
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Image is not loading in RadioButton - fix #28254

    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, partner/syncfusion
